H0.text: what is serbian language called. Slavic Tongue

H1.text: what is serbian language called. Balkan Speech

H2.text: what is serbian language called. South Slavic Dialect

H3.text: what is serbian language called. Serbian language

A4.text: Serbian is a standard variety of Serbo-Croatian, a Slavic language (Indo-European), of the South Slavic subgroup.

A5.text: Serbian is the standard variety of the Serbo-Croatian language mainly used by Serbs.
